H0.text: Degrees Celsius is the unit of measure Jerry should use to report the volume of a liquid.

H1.text: Kilograms is the unit of measure Jerry should use to report the volume of a liquid.

H2.text: Milliliters is the unit of measure Jerry should use to report the volume of a liquid.

H3.text: Centimeters is the unit of measure Jerry should use to report the volume of a liquid.

A4.text: consumer beverages are labelled almost exclusively using litres and millilitres

A5.text: the kilogram was originally defined in 1795 as the mass of one cubic decimetre of water at the temperature of melting ice (0 Â°C)
